beer.name: Tatonka Stout
beer.description: An Imperial Stout -- a classic style so rich and flavorful that it was once the private beverage of Russian Czars. The profile is malty sweet, hop bitter roasted, full-bodied, alcoholic, and deliciously complex. Beer doesn't get much more intense than this!
beer.grains: 2-row pale, crystal malts, chocolate, black, roasted barley oats, brown sugar, molasses
2-row pale, crystal malts, chocolate, black, roasted barley oats, brown sugar, molasses
